name: ListPublicGithubRepositories
description:
Retrieve all public GitHub repositories.

This tool lists all public repositories on GitHub, ordered by creation date. It uses pagination via the 'since' parameter and provides the Link header for navigating pages.

parameters.name: starting_repository_id
parameters.description: Specify a repository ID to list only repositories with an ID greater than this value for pagination.

value_schema.description: A repository ID. Only return repositories with an ID greater than this ID.

parameters.name: repository_visibility
parameters.description: Specify types of repositories to return, such as 'all' or 'public'.

value_schema.description: Specifies the types of repositories to return. This endpoint will only list repositories available to all users on the enterprise.
